content: 1 2 single_crochet in the first chain 1 space 3 single_crochet in each chain-space across slip_stitch to join rnds 45-50 single_crochet in each single_crochet around slip_stitch to join slip_stitch to end at end of round 50 straps make 2 hook size e chain 8 leaving a long tail to attach to bag round 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each of remaining 7 single_crochet turn rnds 2 126 chain 1 single_crochet in each of 7 st do not end off single_crochet in each stitch around outsides of strap making single_crochet 1 chain single_crochet in each corner end off leaving long tail to attach to bag position straps 3-1/2 from outside edge of bag attach using tails i sewed with regular sewing thread first and then used tails to finish © september 27 2008
